strapiEvent.name: Adam Ostrar - Mountain Street Stage
strapiEvent.description:
The Fayetteville Public Library is kicking off its Mountain Street Stage concert series next Sunday, June 5. 

  • The series: Adam Ostrar is a singer-songwriter based out of Austin, TX. Joined by his trusty Gretch Country Gentleman guitar, Adam sings his way through anxiety and despair brought on by our current state of affairs. The subsequent events will be July 3, 10, and 24. 
  • Listen: The Library will cap the event at 200 persons for the health and safety of the performers and the music-loving community. You will be able to live stream the concert on Facebook Live and watch it after the performance, too! 

For more information about the June 26 event, click HERE.
